thread.title: Budding Minds in a Green World

author: Meghan Cox Gurdon
title: Budding Minds in a Green World
text:
‘It’s spring ... the trees are waking up!” writes Chris Butterworth in “The Things That I Love About Trees” (Candlewick, 24 pages, $15.99), a breezy and zestful picture-book appreciation of trees and the changes they undergo with the cycle of the seasons.
In Charlotte Voake’s inky, watercolor-splashed illustrations, children ages 2 to 5 can follow the goings-on of a pretty Stanley plum tree, from its delicate springtime blossoms to the fallen fruit of late summer, as well as the broader alterations in other sorts of trees....
